sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core

Class Listeners

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.Listeners

  • public final class Listeners
extends java.lang.Object
    Static accessor methods pertaining to the listener core.

    This class provides access to the underlying functionality of the currently active ListenerService.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell
    See Also:
    Listener, Resources
